response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would greatly benefit you and enhance your operations. We understand its significance to you, valued at $15,000. To ensure a fair transaction, we propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This offer reflects a balance between compensating us fairly for our investment and providing you with an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a reasonable cost. We look forward to discussing this further and potentially bringing this product to your organization.", "product_price": 12000}
